send.tips: need chrome extension to be installed
send.table.name: Job Name
website.webs: We currently support several websites (with ongoing adaptability) and welcome feedback on additional ones.
website.title: Can assist you in overcoming Google's web page translation for users.
website.description: We have translated and filled in only the important information of the website below. This makes it easier for you to view relevant information.
website.info: Translation services are provided by our own server. If you encounter any network issues, please click the refresh button.
website.help: Hi, If you have any comments or suggestions, please don't hesitate to contact us.
website.text.1: How to Use the it-mercenaries-hunter Plugin Features?
website.text.5: Automatic Translation of Job Search Websites
website.text.6: Function 1: Flexible Management of Submitted Positions
website.text.7: Step 1: Ensure the Plugin is Installed
website.text.8: Step 2: Open the Plugin Main Menu
website.text.9: On the website page where you've submitted applications, click on the left-side Chrome plugin bar, then click on the it-mercenaries-hunter plugin to open the main menu.
website.text.10.1: Check the Mark Checkbox to mark it as Submitted
website.text.12: Click the 'Applied List' button in the main menu, and a pop-up for this website will appear, showing you the list of submitted (marked) websites. You can update the current status and interest level for each webpage.
website.text.13: Function 2: Automatic Translation of Job Search Websites
website.text.14: Step 1: Ensure the Plugin is Installed
website.text.15: Step 2: Open the Plugin Main Menu
website.text.16: On any page, click on the left-side Chrome plugin bar, then click on the it-mercenaries-hunter plugin to open the main menu.
website.text.18: Toggle the 'Translate' setting to the 'On' state and select the language for translation. Currently, options include Japanese, Korean, Chinese, German, French, etc.
website.text.19: Step 4: Open the LinkedIn Website and View Job Listings
website.text.20: At this point, automatic translation is enabled, and you can see the translated results below the job description. If you encounter a website with translation errors, click the refresh button on the right.
home.input-placeholder: Enter the content that needs to be optimized
